name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Your Words, A Tool for Learning Languages

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful tool to help you learn any language, while using most internet resources, including watching videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description – The Web Your Words extension manages a list of words that you feel familiar with, in any latin-character based language (we are working on including all languages). Whether watching videos with closed captions or reading news sources, the highlighting of unfamiliar words gives you an immediate feel for what it will take for you to understand the source. The tool’s capabilities include:
•	Highlighting words that you know, are learning, or are unfamiliar.
•	Showing you the unfamiliar words that will come up the most in the source you are viewing. 
•	Easy translation of words or phrases into your primary language.
